title: How to Make Chinese Chicken Corn Soup

steps.headline: Bring the chicken stock to a boil.
Add the can of corn niblets and stir.
Wait until the water boils again.
steps.description: Then add the cream of corn.

steps.headline: When the water boils again, add the beaten egg slowly, while stirring.
Add the sesame oil, pepper, and salt to taste.
steps.description: Add more if desired. Once combined enough (taste to test), the soup is ready to serve.

text: Bring the chicken stock to a boil.  Add the can of corn niblets and stir.  Wait until the water boils again. Then add the cream of corn. Beat the eggs.  Add the cubed chicken.  When the water boils again, add the beaten egg slowly, while stirring.  Add the sesame oil, pepper, and salt to taste. Add more if desired. Once combined enough (taste to test), the soup is ready to serve. Finished
